description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports necessary React libraries, CSS styles, and the main App component. It initializes the React app by rendering the App component inside a DOM element with the id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering a React application inside a specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders a React element into the root container.
